cookie.title: We use cookies
cookie.description: We use cookies to improve the site, analyze traffic, and support marketing. You can accept all, reject, or customize your choice.
cookie.necessaryDesc: Required for the website to function.
cookie.analyticsDesc: Helps us understand how visitors use the site.
cookie.marketingDesc: Used to measure and personalize ads.
cookie.hint: You can change your choice anytime in the privacy settings.

hero.subtitle: at a comfortable pace with a strong focus on technique
hero.desc: Learn proper technique, build strength, and master skills step by step. Every workout adapts to your level, goals, and schedule.
hero.benefitPlan: personal plan tailored to your goals

strengthTest.title: Sign up for the strength test

login.title: Log in to your account

login.message: Your account is currently in development. We'll email you when the app becomes available.

errors.invalidEmail: Please check your email ‚Äî it looks invalid.
errors.invalidDial: Please check the country code (for example, +34).
errors.invalidPhone: Please check your phone number ‚Äî it looks incomplete or has extra digits.

howItWorks.titleLine1: From the strength test to pull-ups,
howItWorks.desc: We break each skill down into technique, common mistakes, and clear progressions for your current level. The strength test shows where you are now, your goal defines what you‚Äôre working toward, and your personalized program plus coach video reviews help you reach it safely and effectively.

steps.title: Define your level and goals
steps.text: You take our strength test: 5‚Äì7 exercises depending on the course you choose and the equipment you have. We lock in your current level and pick the main goal.

steps.title: Build a program for your level
steps.text: Based on your test, we choose the right exercises and progressions, explain proper technique, and go through common mistakes.

steps.title: Train and build a stronger body
steps.text: You follow workouts in the app, mark completed sessions, and send video check-ins to your coach. The coach gives feedback and updates your training as you progress. You‚Äôll see your strength grow, your technique improve, and your goal become achievable.

courses.badge: Online programs for gym and home
courses.title: Goals and programs
courses.desc: Choose the direction that fits you best right now ‚Äî you can switch to another course at any time. The program adapts flexibly to your level and interests.
courses.scrollHint: Swipe right to see all programs.
courses.scrollNote: Any course can be adapted to your starting level.

light.title: Calisthenics Light
light.desc: A gentle way back into training if you haven‚Äôt worked out in a while or spend a lot of time at a computer. No burnout, no ‚Äúkiller‚Äù routines.

super.title: Super Calisthenics
super.desc: The main course if you simply want to get strong: full body work, progress in pull-ups, handstands, and core basics.

pullupsGirls.title: Pull-ups for girls
pullupsGirls.desc: The goal is your first confident pull-up. No stress, no comparisons, and no ‚Äúthis isn‚Äôt for you‚Äù comments.
features: Super Calisthenics with your chosen goal

handstand.title: Handstand
handstand.desc: From ‚Äúnever held a wall handstand‚Äù to confident balance. We build mobility, strength, and body position awareness.

crossfit.title: Calisthenics for CrossFitters
crossfit.desc: If you want to add confident strict movements to your kipping: pull-ups, handstand push-ups, and muscle-ups ‚Äî without sacrificing technique or shoulders.
features: 60‚Äì80 minutes per workout, pull-up bar needed
Scapular and core strength for gymnastics

gift.title: Gift a certificate
gift.desc: Gift a certificate to a friend or family member so they can take the strength test or buy a course.

pricing.title: How much training costs
pricing.desc: You buy a workout block, complete it at your own pace, and then take the next one. No subscription and no auto-charges.
pricing.noteLeft: 1 workout = a personalized plan in the app + technique review based on your videos.
pricing.noteRight: You can use the workouts at your own pace, with no strict deadlines.

test.title: Strength test
bullets: Access to the app and the training format
test.text: Take the test when it‚Äôs convenient and upload your videos in the app.

review.title: Technique review
bullets: Everything included in the strength test
Detailed technique review from the coach
Your first workout tailored to you
Load recommendations for the next weeks
review.text: Meet the coach and start your calisthenics journey.

short12.title: 12 workouts
bullets: Everything included in the strength test
short12.text: A block to noticeably improve strength, technique, and physique.

long12.title: 12 workouts ‚Äî easy pace
long12.text: Great if you want 2 workouts per week.

long36.title: 36 workouts
long36.text: For those who are staying long-term and want steady progress.

about.title: From a studio to a digital system
about.lead: I Do Calisthenics is a calisthenics school that grew from a studio in Moscow into a bodyweight training system for people all over the world. We combine the experience of in-person coaching with the convenience of an app.

story.p1_prefix: We opened our first studio more than
story.p1_suffix: years ago. Since then, we‚Äôve coached thousands of people: breaking down technique step by step, selecting progressions, and finding the right approach for every athlete‚Äîso movement becomes clear and accessible.
story.p2: Now that experience has moved into a digital format. Everything we used to coach hands-on in the gym has become a system: clear steps from basic movements to advanced skills.
story.p3: For us, online isn‚Äôt a compromise‚Äîit‚Äôs a continuation of what works. You can train from anywhere in the world: at home, on a bar in your yard, or in the gym.
story.mission: Our mission is to help people become stronger, freer, and more confident.

gallery.desc: Calisthenics brings together people of different ages and levels‚Äîthose who want to get stronger or learn skills they‚Äôve been dreaming about for a long time.

testimonials.title: What students say
testimonials.desc: Below are a few reviews from people who have already taken the strength test, received a technique review, and are training with our system.

list.name: Katya (kat.garina)
list.text: I followed the account for a long time and hesitated: would online training actually bring progress, and how would I combine it with regular strength workouts at the gym. Two months ago I decided to try ‚Äî and it turned out to be the best decision. I started calisthenics from zero, and two months is of course not enough to talk about incredible progress, but even now I can see that I feel and control my body better, and because of that my strength numbers in the gym improved too. I like that the exercises are varied and there‚Äôs always a small step forward. Special thanks to Dasha for clear technique explanations, support, and patient answers to my million questions ü´∂üèª I dream of visiting an offline session the next time I travel to Russia!

list.name: Zhenya (mequinte)
list.text: I‚Äôve always been into sports, but lately I had limited time and got bored of doing standard exercises/programs. For a year now I‚Äôve been training calisthenics with you and it exceeded all my expectations! My strength has increased a lot, and at the same time I became more flexible, solid, and enduring. My body settled into a nice shape, even though I didn‚Äôt lose much weight (because I refuse to go on a strict diet). Coach Dasha often sends extra videos to explain unclear details. We set shared goals and work towards them. And of course, what‚Äôs very important to me ‚Äî I can train when it‚Äôs convenient for ME. Love you! Wishing you many years of success! ‚ù§Ô∏è

list.name: Inna (easy_inna_)
list.text: Hello! I‚Äôve been training for the third month ‚Äî since January. I decided to try and unexpectedly found the perfect format for myself: I train when it‚Äôs convenient, and the need to send reports keeps me disciplined) Every workout has different exercises ‚Äî it‚Äôs really interesting. At first it was quite easy, now they adjusted the load and many exercises are already challenging, which is exciting) And there is progress, of course ‚Äî it‚Äôs a great feeling when you get stronger and an exercise becomes easier! My goal is to learn pull-ups with my own bodyweight by summer, and I feel like I‚Äôm already confidently halfway there)

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.desc: If you still have doubts, there‚Äôs probably an answer here. If not, you can always ask the coach a question before you start.

items.question: Is this suitable if I‚Äôve never trained before?
items.answer: Yes. We start with a strength test and simple exercises to understand your level. The program scales to you: from the most basic movements to skills. No ‚Äúcompare to norms‚Äù ‚Äî we only compare you today with you in a few weeks.

items.question: How long does one workout take?
items.answer: On average 30‚Äì60 minutes depending on the format and your level. For beginner programs it‚Äôs closer to 30‚Äì40 minutes. You can train at home, outdoors, or in a gym‚Äîwhatever feels more comfortable.

items.question: Do I need a pull-up bar or a gym?
items.answer: At the very beginning you can train without a gym: some programs are designed for home workouts. But to progress in pull-ups and skills, a pull-up bar or access to a playground is still needed. We‚Äôll tell you the minimal setup worth starting with.

items.question: How does the coach give feedback on technique?
items.answer: You record one set on video and upload it to the app. The coach watches, points out mistakes, gives comments and corrections. Based on that, they build your next workout or adjust the current block so you progress safely.

items.question: What if I miss workouts or fall out of schedule?
items.answer: That‚Äôs normal‚Äîlife doesn‚Äôt always fit a perfect plan. If you miss something, you just return to the program where you left off. The coach can adapt the plan to your new reality: reduce volume, change frequency, or rebuild the week.

items.question: Can I change the course or goal during a training block?
items.answer: Yes. You buy a training block, not a rigid commitment to one course. If during the process you want to shift focus‚Äîfor example from pull-ups to a handstand‚Äîdiscuss it with the coach and they‚Äôll adapt the program.

faq.cta: Still unsure where to start? Try the free strength test ‚Äî it‚Äôs a safe way to understand your level and the training format.

consent.p4: If the User withdraws consent to personal data processing, the Operator may continue processing personal data without the data subject‚Äôs consent where there are legal grounds, including those specified in items 2‚Äì11 of Part 1 of Article 6, Part 2 of Article 10, and Part 2 of Article 11 of Federal Law No. 152-FZ ‚ÄúOn Personal Data‚Äù dated 27.07.2006.

privacy.title: Personal Data Processing Policy
privacy.content:
Personal Data Processing Policy
TERMS AND DEFINITIONS

Website ‚Äî a set of software and hardware tools for computers that publish information and data for public access, united by a common purpose, using technical means for communication between computers on the Internet. In this Policy, the Website means the site located at: https://idcschool.com
Processing of personal data ‚Äî any action (operation) or set of actions (operations) performed with or without the use of automation tools with personal data, including collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification (updating, modification), retrieval, use, transfer (dissemination, provision, access), depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction of personal data.
User ‚Äî an Internet user and, in particular, a user of the Website.
Personal data ‚Äî any information relating directly or indirectly to an identified or identifiable natural person (data subject).
Operator ‚Äî an organization that independently or jointly with others organizes the processing of personal data, and determines the purposes of personal data processing, the personal data to be processed, and the actions (operations) performed with personal data. The Operator is Individual Entrepreneur Ambartsumyan Sirvard Sergeevna (hereinafter ‚Äî the Operator, Tax ID: 26913722).
Automated processing of personal data ‚Äî processing of personal data using computer technology.
Dissemination of personal data ‚Äî an action aimed at disclosing personal data to a certain circle of persons with prior consent, in cases provided for by law.
Provision of personal data ‚Äî actions aimed at disclosing personal data to a specific person or a specific circle of persons.
Blocking of personal data ‚Äî temporary suspension of personal data processing (except where processing is necessary to clarify personal data).
Destruction of personal data ‚Äî actions that result in the impossibility of restoring the content of personal data in the personal data information system and/or result in the destruction of the physical media containing personal data.
Depersonalization of personal data ‚Äî actions that make it impossible, without additional information, to determine the ownership of personal data to a specific data subject.
Information systems and/or databases of personal data ‚Äî a set of personal data contained in electronic databases, as well as information technologies and technical means that ensure their collection, storage, processing, use, and protection.

1. GENERAL PROVISIONS
1.1. This Personal Data Processing Policy is compiled in accordance with the requirements of the Law of the Republic of Armenia ‚ÄúOn Personal Data Protection‚Äù and defines the procedure for processing personal data, as well as measures taken by the Operator to ensure their security.
1.2. This Personal Data Processing Policy:
1.2.1. Establishes the rules for the Operator‚Äôs processing of personal data provided by persons who use the Website https://idcschool.com/, including its subdomains and their pages, to obtain services (hereinafter ‚Äî Clients, Users, the Website).
1.2.2. Defines the purposes, legal grounds, procedure, and scope of personal data processed.
1.2.3. Defines the procedure for interacting with data subjects upon receiving their requests.
1.3. This Policy defines the Operator‚Äôs policy regarding personal data processing. All matters related to personal data processing that are not regulated by this Policy shall be resolved in accordance with the current legislation of the Republic of Armenia in the field of personal data.
1.4. This Policy applies to all information that the Operator may receive about visitors to the Website https://idcschool.com/, including its subdomains and their pages.
1.5. The Operator processes the following categories of personal data:
1.5.1. Full name;
1.5.2. Phone number/messenger;
1.5.3. Email address
1.7. Categories of data subjects whose personal data are processed: natural persons, Users of the Website.

2. PURPOSES OF PERSONAL DATA PROCESSING
2.1. Purposes:
2.1.1. Providing the User with access to the services, information, and/or materials contained on the Website https://idcschool.com/, including its subdomains and their pages, and clarifying order details.
2.1.2. Registering and authenticating the data subject as a User of the Website.
2.1.3. Establishing feedback with the User, including sending notifications and requests related to the use of the Website, and processing inquiries and applications from the User.
2.1.4. Providing the User, with their consent, special offers, pricing information, newsletters, and other information.
2.2. When processing personal data, the Operator applies legal, organizational, and technical measures to ensure the security of personal data in accordance with the requirements of the Law of the Republic of Armenia ‚ÄúOn Personal Data Protection.‚Äù
2.3. The Operator is also entitled to send the User notifications about new products and services, special offers, and various events.
2.4. Anonymized data of Users collected through web analytics services are used to collect information about User actions on the Website and to improve the quality and content of the Website.

3. PRINCIPLES OF PERSONAL DATA PROCESSING
3.1. Personal data processing is organized by the Operator based on the following principles:
3.1.1. Lawfulness of the purposes and methods of personal data processing, good faith, and fairness in the Operator‚Äôs activities.
3.1.2. Accuracy of personal data, adequacy for the purposes of processing, and inadmissibility of processing personal data that are excessive in relation to the purposes declared when collecting personal data.
3.1.3. Processing only those personal data that meet the purposes of their processing.
3.1.4. Ensuring the accuracy, sufficiency, and, where necessary, relevance of personal data in relation to the purposes of personal data processing. The Operator takes the necessary measures, or ensures that such measures are taken, to delete or clarify incomplete or inaccurate data.
3.1.5. Storing personal data in a form that allows identification of the data subject no longer than required by the purposes of personal data processing.
3.2. Personal data processing is carried out in compliance with the principles and rules provided for by the Law of the Republic of Armenia ‚ÄúOn Personal Data Protection‚Äù and this Policy.

4. COLLECTION, PROCESSING, AND STORAGE OF PERSONAL DATA
4.1. The Operator establishes the following procedure for obtaining personal data: when registering on the Website or in the Operator‚Äôs Chat Bot, the data subject provides: full name, phone number, email, messengers, and other information necessary for identifying the data subject and providing services.
4.2. When requesting the Operator‚Äôs services, the Client provides the data established by the relevant forms.
4.3. The Operator does not receive or process the client‚Äôs personal data about race, political views, religious and philosophical beliefs, health status, or intimate life, unless otherwise provided by law.
4.4. If the Client accepts the terms of the User Agreement posted on the Operator‚Äôs Website, the User‚Äôs personal data are processed for the performance of the relevant User Agreement that entered into force as a result of the Client‚Äôs acceptance of the offer, or for the conclusion of another contract, as applicable.
4.5. The Operator has the right to process the personal data of Clients who contacted the Operator only with their consent to the use of personal data.
4.6. The Client‚Äôs consent to personal data processing is not required in the following cases:
4.6.1. Personal data are publicly available.
4.6.2. Personal data processing is carried out on the basis of a law that establishes its purpose, the conditions for obtaining personal data, the circle of data subjects whose personal data are subject to processing, as well as the Operator‚Äôs defined powers.
4.6.3. At the request of authorized state bodies ‚Äî in cases provided for by law.
4.6.4. Processing personal data for the performance of a contract concluded with the Operator.
4.6.5. Processing personal data for statistical or other scientific purposes, provided that personal data are necessarily depersonalized.
4.6.6. Processing personal data is necessary to protect the life, health, or other vital interests of the Client, if obtaining their consent is impossible.
4.7. The Operator ensures the secure storage of personal data, including:
4.7.1. Storage, compilation, accounting, and use of documents containing personal data are organized in the form of a separate archive of the Operator.
4.7.2. Personal data must be stored in a form that allows identification of the data subject no longer than required by the purposes of processing personal data, unless the period for storing personal data is established by law or by a contract to which the data subject is a party, beneficiary, or guarantor. Processed personal data shall be destroyed or depersonalized upon achievement of the purposes of processing or when the need to achieve these purposes is lost, unless otherwise provided by law.
4.8. Grounds for terminating the processing of personal data may include the achievement of the purposes of processing personal data, the expiration of the consent period, or the withdrawal of consent by the personal data subject, as well as the identification of unlawful processing of personal data.
4.9. The security of personal data processed by the Operator is ensured by implementing legal, organizational, and technical measures necessary to fully comply with the requirements of current legislation in the field of personal data protection.
4.10. The Operator ensures the safety of personal data and takes all possible measures to exclude access to personal data by unauthorized persons.
4.11. If inaccuracies in personal data are detected, the User may update them independently by sending the Operator a notice to the Operator‚Äôs email address with the note ‚ÄúPersonal data update.‚Äù
4.12. The period of personal data processing is unlimited until the termination of activities or liquidation of the organization, or the User may withdraw their consent to personal data processing at any time by sending the Operator a notice via email to the Operator‚Äôs email address with the note ‚ÄúWithdrawal of consent to personal data processing.‚Äù

5. MEASURES TO ENSURE THE SECURITY OF PERSONAL DATA
5.1. The Operator takes the following measures to ensure the security of personal data as provided by Article 19 of the Law of the Republic of Armenia ‚ÄúOn Personal Data Protection.‚Äù
5.1.1. Internal control is carried out for compliance of personal data processing with the requirements of the Law of the Republic of Armenia ‚ÄúOn Personal Data Protection‚Äù and the regulatory legal acts adopted in accordance with it, including the requirements for ensuring the security of personal data.
5.1.2. A document defining the policy regarding personal data processing and information on the implemented requirements for personal data protection is published and posted on the Operator‚Äôs Website on the Internet, through which services are directly provided.
5.1.3. Organizational and technical measures are applied to ensure the security of personal data when processed in information systems, necessary to meet the requirements for personal data protection, the fulfillment of which ensures the levels of protection of personal data established by the Government of the Republic of Armenia:
appointment of officials responsible for organizing the processing and protection of personal data;
limiting the number of persons admitted to the processing of personal data;
informing data subjects about the requirements of legislation and the Operator‚Äôs regulatory documents on the processing and protection of personal data;
organizing accounting, storage, and handling of media containing personal data;
determining threats to the security of personal data during their processing, forming threat models based on them;
developing a system for protecting personal data based on the threat model;
checking the readiness and effectiveness of using information security tools;
delimiting user access to information resources and hardware/software for information processing;
logging and accounting for user actions in personal data information systems;
using antivirus tools and tools for restoring the personal data protection system;
when necessary, applying firewall tools, intrusion detection, vulnerability analysis, and cryptographic protection of information.
5.1.4. Rules for access to personal data processed in the information system are established, as well as logging and accounting of all actions performed with personal data in the Operator‚Äôs information system are ensured.
5.1.6. Control is exercised over the measures taken to ensure the security of personal data and the level of protection of the Operator‚Äôs information systems.
5.1.7. The possibility of uncontrolled entry or presence of unauthorized persons in premises where work with personal data is carried out is excluded. The safety of personal data media and information protection tools is ensured. If personal data are processed on physical media, separate storage of personal data (physical media) processed for different purposes is ensured.
5.1.8. The Operator provides for the following measures to protect personal data: use of antivirus software; use of electronic digital signatures (EDS); passwords on computers on which personal data are processed; backups; restricted access to premises where personal data are processed.

6. TRANSFER OF PERSONAL DATA
6.1. Personal data are transferred to the Operator subject to the following requirements:
6.1.1. It is prohibited to disclose personal data to a third party without the written consent of the Client, except where this is necessary to prevent a threat to the Client‚Äôs life or health, as well as in other cases provided by law.
6.1.2. Do not disclose personal data for commercial purposes without the written consent of the data subject.
6.1.3. Warn persons receiving personal data that such data may be used only for the purposes for which they were provided, and require these persons to confirm that this rule is observed.
6.1.4. Allow access to personal data only to specially authorized persons, and such persons must have the right to receive only those personal data that are necessary to perform specific functions.
6.1.5. Do not request information about the Client‚Äôs state of health, except for information related to the possibility of the Client performing obligations under a contract with the Operator.
6.1.6. Transfer the Client‚Äôs personal data to their representatives in the manner established by the Law of the Republic of Armenia ‚ÄúOn Personal Data Protection.‚Äù
6.1.7. Personal data processing may be carried out through mixed processing with transmission over the Operator‚Äôs internal network, with transmission over the Internet, and through automated processing without transmission over the Operator‚Äôs internal network but with transmission over the Internet.
6.1.8. The Operator does not carry out cross-border transfer of personal data.
6.1.9. Cryptographic means: use of EDS.

7. LEGAL GROUNDS FOR PERSONAL DATA PROCESSING
7.1. The legal basis for processing personal data is a set of legal acts pursuant to and in accordance with which the Operator processes personal data on the basis of: current legislation, contracts between the Operator and the data subject, consent to personal data processing (in cases not directly provided by the legislation of the Republic of Armenia but consistent with the Operator‚Äôs powers), including:
‚Ä¢ Consent of the data subject to the processing of their personal data;
‚Ä¢ Law of the Republic of Armenia ‚ÄúOn Personal Data Protection‚Äù;
‚Ä¢ Regulatory legal acts of the Republic of Armenia governing the procedure for processing and the requirements for protecting personal data.
7.2. The Operator processes the User‚Äôs personal data only if they are filled in and/or submitted by the User independently via special forms located on the Website https://idcschool.com/, including its subdomains and their pages. By filling out the relevant forms and/or submitting their personal data to the Operator, the User expresses consent to this Policy. For interaction via the chat bot, the User‚Äôs consent is considered given from the moment the bot is used and the link to this Policy is shown.
7.3. The Operator processes anonymized data about the User if this is allowed in the User‚Äôs browser settings (saving ‚Äúcookies‚Äù and use of JavaScript technology is enabled).

8. FINAL PROVISIONS
8.1. The User can receive any clarifications on issues related to the processing of their personal data by contacting the Operator via email.
8.2. Upon achievement of the purposes of personal data processing, as well as if the personal data subject withdraws consent to their processing, personal data are subject to destruction if:
8.2.1. Otherwise not provided for by a contract to which the data subject is a party, beneficiary, or guarantor;
8.2.2. The Operator is not entitled to process personal data without the data subject‚Äôs consent on the grounds provided by the law ‚ÄúOn Personal Data Protection‚Äù or other laws;
8.2.3. Otherwise not provided for by another agreement between the Operator and the data subject.
8.3. The Operator reserves the right to amend this Policy at its discretion, including when caused by changes in legislation or the Terms of Use of the Website‚Äôs services. Notifications about changes to the Personal Data Processing Policy may be displayed on the Website (for example, in the Account, via a pop-up or banner) before such changes take effect, or may be sent by email. The User is responsible for reviewing the text of the Personal Data Processing Policy each time they use the Website.
8.4. The Operator is obliged to inform the data subject or their representative about the processing of their personal data upon request, which may be sent to the Operator‚Äôs email address.
8.5. A new version of the Personal Data Processing Policy enters into force from the moment it is posted in the relevant section of the Operator‚Äôs Website. If the User disagrees with the terms of the Policy, they must immediately stop using the Website and its services.

9. OPERATOR DETAILS:
Ambartsumyan Sirvard Sergeevna
Tax ID: 26913722
E-mail: silva.ambartsumian@outlook.com
